runs.comm: he went for the yorker first up, but overdid the angle a tad and it was sliding down
bowled full and swings in at the stumps, a mistimed drive is the result
he got a lot of bat on this pitched up delivery this time, but hit it straight to mid off
a bouncer now, de Kock, who is standing a long way outside the crease, gets down on a knee and lets it go over
this swings in, but full, low and down the pads, and is put away past short fine leg
another one swings in, right on off this time, but de Kock is waiting, he opens the face as he glides it wide of point, who dives and takes pace off it
straightens and bounces on middle, nudged to square leg

oh dear, he needs two balls to strike, de Kock struck on the pad, and struck right in front, this skids on from round the stumps, hint of straightening and past de Kock's attempted waft to leg from the crease
worked to square leg off the pad
floats it across the right hander and beats the outside edge as he plays for non-existent turn
tries the sweep in hope, from outside off, there is no turn again on this one, and he is beaten again
this time he shuffles across and just pats it back, again it was the one that skids across, top over
steady and accurate is what you will get from Angelo, back of a length, angled in, right on off, defended
good length, turned through square leg off the pad
good length on off, pushed in front of mid on for a quick single
this moved away slightly outside off, and though he reached out for it, wasn't able to guide it past point
slower one, he leans forward and works it in front of square leg
walks down and stands outside off stump, can only push a length delivery away
comes forward and tries to work to leg one that straightens from round the stumps, leading edge to covers
saw him backing away and pushed it far down the leg side
run out chance as he pushes to cover but the keeper fails to gather the throw on the bounce

and another one falls, he's tried sweeping a length ball and got beaten, he tries sweeping a tossed up full ball this time, misses, loses balance, and is hit in front, ball tracker shows that clipping off
flighted and comes in with the angle, is worked behind square, there is some hesitation before they go through for the single
the straighter one again, and another leading edge off the captain's blade as he tries to work to leg
sees it angled across and shapes for the punch, but it holds the line and he can;t time it
lovely, this one carries across with the angle, and Duminy ends up driving inside the line
overpitched, JP D drives firmly but bowler is in the way, and it rolls to mid on
no stopping this one, Duminy's stepped forward to a length ball and found the gap at cover
leg side now, takes it from middle and clips it between midwicket and mid on, who has a tough chase with a quick outfield against him, pulls it back just inside with a slide
leading edges all around, now JP D gets one to a fullish delivery, cover fields
Faf gets the boundary early in the over, backs away to leg and slaps a full delivery on middle straight down the ground
nudges a full delivery to square leg

too much shuffling across and backing away, and Senanayake has taken his third, du Plessis moved around so much he ended up pushing inside the line of this flighted delivery, it was the straighter one, zipped across and hit off
eases into a drive right away, cover could have tested him with the throw, if only he had picked it up cleanly
not committing too much, yet timing the punch to covers neatly
this should have gone, a rare poor one from Senanayake, shortish and too wide, but AB misses the cut
tosses it up outside off, JP mistimes the drive to the bowler
skips out and clips it through midwicket from outside off
almost another one, an uppish push from AB, falls short of midwicket and goes past him to his left
goes right deep in the crease to work to midwicket, fielder from the deep runs in to keep them to one
charges out and has a go, hits it straight back to the bowler, and it is hit so hard it bursts out and travels to deep mid on
comes down the pitch but fails to work it to leg and is hit on the pad
and is put away through extra cover first ball, AB didn;t need to get the front foot out at all, his hands did everything for him
charges out but mistimes it down to long off
pitched up delivery clipped to wide long on where Jeevan Mendis prevents the second with a sprint and a quick release
Thisara tries the short ball, it sits up around off, and AB plunders a pull to the deep midwicket rope
he hasn't achieved much when he's charged out, mistimes another one to extra cover
a full toss to end the over, eased out to the sweeper
big escape for AB, Malinga's bowled it short first up, a surprised AB's gone for a weak waft of a pull, but the top edge has just fallen short of fine leg
short of a length, worked off the pad to fine leg
a very low full toss outside off, and he can't get enough on the drive, to mid off
slower one outside off, he adjusts and dabs it to third man
sharp short ball into the body, but Duminy's handled it superbly, hitting it into the ground through square leg, and it needs a dive in the deep to prevent the boundary
another slower one, and Duminy has to adjust on the drive, eases it to the sweeper
pushed to extra cover
comes down the track, Mendis shortens it, Duminy ends up stabbing it in the air, but midwicket is vacant
tossed up, overpitched, AB attacks it, but cannot time and place the drive wide of the sweeper
quick and fullish on the stumps, pushed back
this jags across very sharply, almost a wide before Duminy slaps it to extra cover
bowls it full on the pads, and it runs fine past the keeper
dropped, the shortish ball was angled into AB and he went for the pull, it was a sharp diving chance for midwicket to his right, but Chandimal's spilled it

they have the big one next ball, the drop doesn't cost anything, AB's backed away and slashed a shortish ball over cover, but has ended up mishitting high in the air, sweeper's run in and tumbled forward, and has held onto the ball all the while
pitched up delivery pushed to the bowler, nice stop by Angelo to his right
good length, he cuts it with the angle across him to third man
bouncer, around off stump, leaving the left-hander, who pulls his head inside the line
was late in going after this tossed up full delivery and is beaten as it dips outside off
shuffles across and works it in front of square leg off middle stump
pitched up, driven off the front foot past extra cover
angled in full, worked to deep midwicket
jumps out, stops outside off and stabs it past the non-striker to long on
skips out and works it to deep midwicket again, he is looking alright, JP D
slower length ball at 107 kph outside off, square driven to the sweeper
neat drive off the front foot but Chandimal dives onto the practice wicket at extra cover and stops it
slaps a widish one to sweeper cover
pitched up, widish, but he mistimes it to extra cover
can;t beat mid off now, even as he times the drive this time
opens the face and runs a length ball down to third man
tossed up, into the pad, whipped to deep midwicket
lots of flight, lots of it, Miller comes forward and pats it back, such is the state of this innings
and when he walks out, he ends up stabbing an edge in the air, fortunately it does not carry to point
appeal for run out after a push to cover, there is a dive from Miller, and that has saved him, direct hit would have had him probably
full delivery worked out to deep midwicket
turning away, keeping a tad low, but shortish, and is slapped past extra cover
lucky to get away, this straigthens after being angled across, and he gets an inside edge close to the stumps
walks out, is nowhere close to the pitch of this offspinner, and ends up chipping it well short of long on
clipped square on the leg side
quick and straight length ball on middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
some cheer for South Africa, he slog-sweeps an offspinner from middle stump, and it clears the rope at deep square leg
quicker and flatter one on middle, he walks across and turns it square
comes out, but is beaten in the flight and pats it back
sharp turn outside off, he reaches for it and dabs it square
flighted ball, he reaches the pitch and clips it to deep midwicket
lunges at a sweep outside off, deep square leg runs to his left to field
straighter one just outside off, he manages to squeeze it fine past the keeper
a low and wide full toss but they are wary of him and this is patted away to extra cover
a slower one, cuts away outside off, steered to third man
angled across but sprayed far too wide
around the blockhole outside off, he attacks it but can only hit it to the sweeper
found the gap on the short slower one, picks it from off and pulls it to deep midwicket
another slower one, pitched fuller, and Duminy mishits a slog to vacant midwicket
drives a full delivery, but without much power, and straight to extra cover on the edge of the circle
comes out, takes it on the full, whips through midwicket, Thisara runs around from long on, keeps them to one
here comes Miller, reaches the pitch and carts the offspinner high over wide long on
quicker, fuller, worked through midwicket and this time the second cannot be prevented
charges out, reaches it on the full and drills it hard to wide long off, who slides across and fields on the bounce
around the blockhole, JP cannot get under it, and slogs through square leg
another one quick and very full, Miller can only push it to long on
too full for him to get under it comfortably, and he drills it along the ground to long off
opens the face and runs this widish full delivery behind point, but third man is quick to the ball

superb reaction from Senanayake at wide long off, Miller did not seem to have got much distance on this full delivery, but it continued to travel and was heading over the boundary, before Senanayake leaped and took it, was headed towards the rope, and he let go if it well in time, saved five runs
very low full toss on middle, swatted to midwicket who makes a sharp stop

Miller's gone now, goes after a full widish delivery outside off, ends up slicing it high, and Dilshan at sweeper cover does the rest after some hesitation, it almost slips through his fingers, but he hangs on
low and wide full toss guided to point
full toss slogged to the deep midwicket boundary, Duminy has propped South Africa with his fifty
full and quick, can;t get under it, slogs along the ground to long on
quick length delivery on off stump, worked through midwicket
right in the blockhole, tossed up and dips right on the stumps, JP makes room but has to dig it out
low full toss on the stumps, JP slogs, straight to deep midwicket
he swings at a length ball, the top edge swirls over the bowler, he runs back but can't reach it with a dive, and they have scrambled two
